Hinata's hands turn white, with [[chakra]] coating and flowing through them. She takes several swipes at the opponent, and finishes by bringing together both her hands. This creates a large explosion that damages and knocks back the opponent.

== Trivia ==
* In ''[[Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm]]'', to execute this technique, Hinata hits her opponent with both her palms, pushing them back. Then she spins towards her opponent and delivers three more palm strikes, sending the opponent flying back.

[[pl:Hakurō Tenbu]]
